roleset.name: form into beads (as a substance)
roleset.note: BEAD-V NOTES: Based on internet search and wordnet. Added because none existed. Refer to Vncls substance_emission-43.4 (not a member because it's not an exact fit, but it's close). Comparison to 'emanate'. (from bead.01-v)

roles.note: Agent role not actually observed. (from bead.01-v)

role.descr: agentive producer of liquid (may not occur)
theme, liquid substance forming into drops

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Then wait about a minute as the condensation beads.

example.name: intransitive with location
example.text: Ochre sap beaded on the pale meat of the twained wood.
example.arg: on the pale meat of the twained wood.

example.name: transitive with theme and location
example.text: Sweat beaded his brows as he fastened the last knot on his uniform.
example.arg: as he fastened the last knot on his uniform.

example.name: transitive with source and theme
example.text: The bailiff's brow beaded sweat from the unaccustomed exertion.

roleset.name: apply beads to
roleset.note: BEAD-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls illustrate-25.3, build-26.1. Comparison to 'decorate'. (from bead.02-v)

role.descr: thing being covered in beads, destination

example.name: passive with theme and destination
example.text: [Faux pearls]-1 were beaded *trace*-1 onto slightly stretchy jewelry sting.

example.name: Transitive with destination
example.text: After she beaded the clock, she looked at a switch plate nearby and said "More beads, more baubles!"

example.name: intransitive
example.text: I could have beaded all night.

example.name: with pattern
example.text: [Seed pearls]-1 were beaded *trace*-1 into patterns to create fanciful images of flowers.
example.arg: to create fanciful images of flowers

roleset.name: bead_up
roleset.note: BEAD_UP-V NOTES: Based on internet search and wordnet. See Vncls substance_emission-43.4. Comparison to bead.01. (from bead.03-v)

role.descr: agentive producer of liquid (may not occur)
theme, liquid substance forming into drops

example.name: arg1 as subject
example.text: This foam is very dense so water beads up on it
